casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher John HORTON. No. 367P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Sherri G. Horner, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Christopher Horton, Windsor, for Horton, Christopher John Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015." ERVIN, J. recused.
